# Static Files for Call in Sick Bot

This directory contains static files used by the application.

## Required Files:
- ElevenLabs.png - Place your ElevenLabs logo image file here.
  - This should be the ElevenLabs logo with a transparent background
  - For best results, use a PNG file with a transparent background
  - The image will be displayed with a maximum width of 200px

## Generated Files:
- sick_call.mp3 - This is the generated audio file created by the application
  - This file is overwritten each time a new sick call is generated
